DocAttribute.Name: CoordIndex
DocAttribute.Documentation: One-dimensional list with the indices for the three or more points, that define the vertices of the outer loop. If the tessellated face set is closed, indicated by _SELF\IfcTessellatedFaceSet.Closed_, then the points, defining the outer loop, shall connect counter clockwise, as seen from the outside of the body, so that the resulting normal will point outwards. > NOTE  The coordinates of the vertices are provided by the indexed list of _SELF\IfcTessellatedFaceSet.Coordinates.CoordList_. If the _SELF\IfcTessellatedFaceSet.PnIndex_ is provided, the indices point into it, otherwise directly into the _IfcCartesianPointList3D_.

DocAttribute.Name: ToFaceSet
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the _IfcPolygonalFaceSet_ for which this face is associated.
